thread.title: Happy Customer
thread.title_full: Project Management Academy reviewed by Happy Customer

author: Happy Customer
title: Happy Customer
text: The tools and training provided by PMA truly helped me to prepare for the exam. The materials arrived a couple weeks before my class, so I had time to review them and start to memorize the 47 processes. Then I took the four day intensive boot camp course, which provided excellent information. I then utilized the PMA website to take practice exams and a host of other study tools. A week after I took the course, I sat for the exam and actually felt the exam was quite easy, due to how much PMA had helped me prepare. I recommend PMA.
